body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Daniel King and the customer's name is Kathleen Brown.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Daniel King, and I am a representative of Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Daniel, nice to meet you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It’s great to meet you too! May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My name is Kathleen Brown.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kathleen! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m looking to buy a motorcycle but I’m feeling a bit overwhelmed.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. It can be a lot to take in. Can I have your phone number to help coordinate our conversation?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it’s four zero one, two three four, five six seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. And could you also provide me with your city of residence?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! I appreciate you sharing that with me, Kathleen. Is there a specific type of motorcycle you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for a cruiser. Something comfortable for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds exciting! We have some great options in that category. Thank you for your time today, Kathleen. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out to us!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Daniel! I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Have a great day!
